news.title: X Expands into Financial Services with Trading and Payment Cards
news.body: X, previously known as Twitter, is venturing into financial services, introducing trading services and exploring the launch of its own payment cards. This strategic pivot, highlighted by CEO Linda Yaccarino and reported by Finextra, signifies a major shift in the convergence of social media and financial technology, potentially reshaping user engagement and revenue streams.

news.title: UK Government to Boost Economy with Extended Open Banking
news.body: The UK's Smart Data Group is set to expand the principles of open banking to other sectors, aiming to unlock a staggering £28 billion in economic value. This initiative, reported by Finextra, could revolutionize data sharing, spur competition, and foster innovation across diverse industries, setting a global benchmark for data-driven economic growth.

news.title: Coinbase Launches Stablecoin Payment Service for Global Merchants
news.body: Coinbase has introduced a new stablecoin-based payment service, enabling merchants worldwide to accept payments in USDC. Reported by Finextra, this move positions Coinbase at the forefront of the stablecoin market, offering a secure and simplified transaction solution that could influence global e-commerce and digital payments.

news.title: Visa Urges Financial Institutions to Adopt Stablecoin Strategies
news.body: Visa is pushing for a comprehensive stablecoin strategy among financial institutions, especially in the CEMEA region. This initiative, as reported by Finextra, aims to enhance settlement capabilities and integrate blockchain technology, potentially transforming the landscape of digital transactions and settlements.

news.title: Applebee’s and IHOP to Enhance Operations with AI Technology
news.body: Applebee’s and IHOP, under Dine Brands, are set to deploy AI technology across 3,500 locations to improve customer service and operational efficiency. This large-scale AI integration, reported by PYMNTS.com, could set a new standard in the restaurant industry, enhancing customer experiences and streamlining management practices.
